videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: Nobody can touch my commander.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a blue/white control deck, featuring Dragonlord Ojutai as commander in Brawl.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

00:00 - Intro 
02:01 - Deck Tech
07:36 - vs Urza, Lord Protector
19:06 - vs Prosper, Tome-Bound
30:52 - vs Goreclaw, Terror of Qal-Sisma
37:15 - vs Atraxa, Praetors' Voice
43:31 - vs Tasigur, the Golden Fang

Decklist: 
https://aetherhub.com/Deck/dragonlord-ojutai-brawl
